attributes.action: bring in harder penalties for crimes committed against children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of recent events I and many others have been outraged at the way some "human beings" believe it is ok to treat children in this country and strongly feel that if tougher penalties are brought into place, this would bring the crime numbers down.

More needs to be done to protect our children: In memory of baby P there has been a group set up on the networking website, Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=35111006403 

I am sure you will see, if you take the time to read through, has lots of people all speaking with the same voice.

NEVER AGAIN should mean never again!

With over 4,000 people now in this group and in many other campaigns we now leave it to you, our prime minister to take serious action to make sure that in these types of crimes, life means life and action MUST be taken to ensure these criminals are never allowed near our children again! 

We the public now put our trust in you.
